user.description: Configure your API keys and preferences for the Weather Image Generator.

data.max_images_retained: Maximum number of images to retain.
data.location_aspect: Significance of the location in the image.
data.weather_description: Weather conditions to include in the image.
data.time_of_day_effect: Effect of the time of day on the image.
data.artistic_direction: Artistic style to be applied to the image.
data.distinct_elements: Key elements and landmarks to feature.
data.cultural_hints: Cultural or seasonal elements to incorporate.
data.prompt_precision: Precision and clarity of the prompt.
data.visual_goal: Intended visual and emotional impact of the image.

error.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of this integration is allowed.
